front.title: Recommendation for key derivation through extraction-then-expansion

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This Recommendation specifies techniques for the derivation of keying material from a shared secret established during a key establishment scheme defined in NIST Special Publications 800-56A or 800-56B through an extraction-then-expansion procedure.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
